title: Very high ping after installing patch 7.11-7.12
body:
The ping was decent and constant before that, 50- max. 70 ms. However, in the last couple of weeks, the ping goes crazy high while ingame (especially where there is a lot of action out of a sudden- a teamfight, for instance), from 200 (minimum) to even as high as 8k. It's unplayable, and this affects Normal, ARAM, and to a lesser extent, vs. CO-op games.  I have not installed any other software recently, and the internet connection works perfectly fine for everything else (watching videos, playing other games, etc). Anyone else experiencing this? Any fix?
Thanks!

There's a chance your network might be having some issues with packet loss. Check out this [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) to test for packet loss and use some of the game logs that had that crazy lag. Do me a favor and take a screenshot to post here so we can go over it together!

Yeah, after weeks of me trying to fix my problems and to "not use the public internet" even though I can play other games like MechWarrior online which are way more demanding just fine, and after extensive googling and screwing with my laptop's registry and internet options, I think at this point it is definitely not my end. Too bad my "friends", enemies, and apparently Riot itself for that matter don't give a crap considering they are promoting more people to play their game. Patch 7.11-7.12 are screwed up. And ignoring a minority of players that are experiencing ping spikes right at the worst times is not right. 

Haha, not only that, but if you go back to base to be away from keyboard to HELP YOUR TEAM by not feeding, the game gives you some bs about how it is not fair for your team AND PENALIZES YOU WHILE YOU ARE ALREADY SUFFERING. Why did I have to log in to see the comments below is also beyond me.
 
And by the way, I decided to be penalized on purpose considering that I should give this game some alone time. You know, if something has an problem, and your help is not working, it is best to let it overcome its alcohol addiction I mean ping spikes to itself.

Oh and I even ran the hextech repair tool AFTER reinstalling. Still nothing.
